events.title: Moved back to Orlando, FL.
events.description: Moved back to Orlando, FL from North Carolina.

events.title: Launched First Public App
events.description: Launched the official HD Supply White Cap iOS and Android app in their respective app stores. Used Appcelerator platform to develop this cross-platform app with the mobile team at HD Supply.

events.title: Rebuilt DemetriDesign.com
events.description: Completely rebuilt my personal site so I could learn some new tricks and put them to practical use. Check out my blog post about it here.

events.title: Redesigned Brock & Scott Law Firm Website
events.description: Worked with committee of Law Firm Partners to completely redesign and develop their website. Used responsive web design, interactive SVG and icon fonts for retina support.

events.title: Moved to North Carolina
events.description: Moved from Orlando, FL to Winston-Salem, NC. Working remotely full-time.

events.title: Launched DemetriDesign.com
events.description: Originally created as a WordPress theme. Fully responsive with CSS3 animations.

events.title: Attended Future of Web Design NYC Conference
events.description: Participated in SASS workshop following the conference.

events.title: Launched HD Supply Location Finder
events.description: My first responsive web design project. Designed and developed a branch location finder web app for all screen sizes.

events.title: Graduated from University of Central Florida
events.description: Bachelor of Arts in Digital Media

events.title: Started working at HD Supply
events.description: First IT intern at the Orlando Corporate office.
